casebody.data:
Gustavo Julian GARCIA, petitioner,
v.
William STEPHENS, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. No. 15-6557 (15A786). Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 10, 2016.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice SCALIA and by him referred to the Court denied. Petition for rehearing denied.
